page.title: 02STATELY HOMES
page.content: OWNED BY THE EARL OF DERBY AND CALLED {KNOWSLEY PARK.}The present earl, the 18th, is a keen breeder of race horses on his own stud farm. {KNOWSLEY HALL} is not open to the public for the estate is a working one.Part of the estate is leased to the water board,but there are other stretches of water containing fish and visited by many wild fowl.There are also plantations of deciduous trees and conifers.Some of these trees are for sale to the public.Farming is also carried on at {PARK FARM }and {HOME {FARM }.Part of the estate contains the {SAFARI PARK }mentioned elsewhere.There are also cottages for the workers,and lodges for the keepers.The names of some of the dams include {WHITE MAN'S DAM,MIZZY {DAM,KENNEL DAM. }
